synopsis.text: After months without work, renowned bodyguard-for-hire Ryo Saeba finally gets a high-profile client - Sayaka Asagiri, a popular TV news anchor. However, Sayaka is being targeted by her own employers at the TV station she works at, who will stop at nothing to see her dead. Ryo takes Sayaka under his protection, but they soon find themselves on the run when fake news reports frame Ryo for Sayaka's kidnapping and murder. With Ryo's reputation at stake and their lives in danger, he and his partner Kaori must get to the bottom of the fake news conspiracy and confront the ruthless executives behind the TV station's corrupt practices. Dodging both assassins and police, Ryo races against time to clear his name, reveal the truth, and take down the criminals threatening him and Sayaka. This case will test the limits of Ryo's skills as he takes on the combined might of media power and ruthless ambition.
